name: Southern Company
summary: Southern Company is one of the largest gas and electric utility holding companies in the United States, serving approximately 9 million customers through its subsidiaries across six states. Headquartered in Atlanta, it operates regulated electric and gas utilities, as well as wholesale energy and infrastructure businesses, with a strong focus on clean, reliable, and affordable energy solutions. The company is publicly traded on the NYSE under the ticker 'SO' and is ranked 163rd on the 2025 Fortune 500 list.
